name: Rictus Rave (Proof of concept)
description:
This Proof of Concept is a face detection shooter, where players play as a Medusa-esq sorority sister, who’s smile freezes incoming dangerous drunk frat guys. We were inspired to make a parody of “greek life”, and investigate why a mechanic would have players smiling to shoot.

(We encourage you try the keyboard version as Face Tracking is currently unoptimized and difficult to run correctly on laptops)

The Team

Dylan Dugourd - Programming, Game Design

Kiara Blanz - Medusa Bust Art and Animation

V Tucker - Narrative, UI Art and Animation

Kevin Long - 3D Design and Level Design

Phyrex Hasten - Sound Design

Controls - Face Tracking Move your head to aim Smile to Shoot R to restart Controls - Keyboard Arrow Keys to aim Space to Shoot R to restart
